name: 10xgen
description: A 10x shit post generator written by a 0.9x engineer

scripts.release: npm test && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release

author: Deepu K Sasidharan
